articles.author: Paul McLeary, Jack Detsch
articles.title: Limited weapons and a regional crisis could dog the US in fight with Houthis - POLITICO
articles.description: The administration’s bombing campaign against the Iran-backed group is running up against America's political and industrial limits.
articles.content: American warplanes and ships have hit more than 30 targets in Yemen since Saturday, targeting Houthi leaders and missile storage facilities in what President Donald Trump called an overwhelming effor… [+4245 chars]
